metadata.Title: CVE-2023-30775 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A vulnerability was found in the libtiff library. This security flaw causes a heap buffer overflow in extractContigSamples32bits, tiffcrop.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-30775` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.8
libtiff-tools - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.8
libtiff5 - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.8
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.8
No subscription required

notes.Note: 0xnishit> This CVE has the same fix as CVE-2022-3570. CVE-2022-3570 has already been fixed across releases.

criterions.comment: tiff package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.9-5ubuntu0.8').
